channel.title: Instance on Fore Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Instance on Fore Documentation

item.title: Hello World
item.description: What can be learned here: the basic structure of Fore <fx-model> and <fx-instance> elements using a Template Expression Hello World - Step by Step Each <fx-fore> element has a single model. 1. Add the model First step to create a data-bound ‘Hello World’ example is to add a model. <fx-fore> <fx-model></fx-model> </fx-fore> The <fx-model> is a direct child of the <fx-fore> element. 2. Add some data Not very exciting so far, so add some data:
